bug.author: benidis
bug.summary: The calculation of dataset statistics reads wrong feature fields
bug.description: Given a dataset ds that includes features, ds.calc_stats() searches for cat and dynamic_feat to compute feature statistics, which are outdated fields. This always givas as ouput cats=[] and num_dymanic_feat=0. This issue appeared in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts/issues/280>#280</denchmark-link> as a side problem.
